name: A Game About Mowing Your Lawn
summary: A simplistic game about mowing your lawn. Harvest grass, sell clippings, upgrade your gear, and experience the beauty and detail.

name: Mavors
summary: A combination of Strategy and City Building, featuring modular units, organic growth, and true simultaneous movement. Territory expands into unclaimed tiles automatically while population grows exponentially. Units draw directly from population for manpower, their armament is entirely up to you.

name: Plylbl
summary: PLYLBL is a collection of games of various genres and styles. Adventures, puzzles, racing and many other genres are gathered in one place. Discover new games and play them alone or together with friends online or on the same screen!

name: Bober Constructions
summary: Bober k***w. Patrz jakie bydle! And even more than just one. 4 beaver-builders, and you can control one of them. Create structures, manage time and resources, watch out for obstacles, and remember, fast action is the key to success!

name: Schedule I
summary: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.

name: Atomfall: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Pre-order the Atomfall Deluxe Edition to receive:
• The entire Atomfall game
• 3 days Early Access
• “Story Expansion Pack” – (*not available Day 1):
• “Basic Supply Bundle” Pack
• “Enhanced Supply Bundle” Pack

name: Iron Village
summary: With the help of your railway, build houses, farms, warehouses, and more to create your village. Trade what your people make for other resources and gold to grow your village into a prospering town, and grow the railway into a powerhouse.

name: Upstream
summary: Play as a salmon journeying home in this challenging physics based platformer using only two buttons! Remember that on a voyage through innumerable obstacles and constant danger, it is your reaction to adversity that determines your success.

name: River Towns
summary: Solve puzzles by placing buildings and creating vibrant cities in River Towns. Each district has its own style and shapes, making every level a new challenge. Help to restore and rebuild our River Towns.

name: Grandma's In Hell
summary: Addictive and unique tower defense game. Play as Grandma as she outwits waves of demons across 40 amazing levels. Build mazes that send demons to their doom. Spend countless hours on one of the best strategy games available.

name: Cyborg: Rise
summary: An adventure game that combines first person shooter and Roguelite random elements. Players can manipulate heroes with different abilities in the game. Embark on adventure challenges in random levels. Every time you respawn, you can unlock new skills and equipment to challenge stronger enemies.

name: Card Summoner
summary: Card Summoner is a CCG, where you journey to various villages and engage in local clan tournaments to elevate your rank. Duel villagers and collect unique cards while fulfilling your summoner duties by battling monsters in the void dungeons.

name: Turtle Riders
summary: Choose your weapons and ride your giant turtle while hordes of enemies try to take you down. Gather orbs to upgrade and pick the right skills to survive the long road to the outpost!

In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?

name: Psycho Patrol R
summary:
Psycho Patrol R is a mecha FPS hybrid policing and punishment simulator set in the decayed state of Pan-Europa. You play as an officer of the European Federal Police, a V-Stalker pilot of Psycho Patrol, a special unit tasked with solving mental crime, among other things.

The gameplay is a combination of high intensity tactical FPS combat, combined seamlessly with operating your V-Stalker mecha unit to decimate your enemies. The world is open with a variety of different goals to achieve.

Wide variety of weapons, from small arms to 120mm cannons.
Customize your V-Stalker for a massive tactical advantage.
Choose from a wide variety of routes and approaches.
Open, non-linear world.
Unique NPCs to meet and interact with.
Solve the mystery of the Orgone.

name: Dinosaur World
summary: Dinosaur World is a survival game about dinosaurs. You can tame and hunt dinosaurs, ride them, grow crops, craft a variety of weapons, build houses and furniture.

name: Dark Deity II
summary: Verroa is a peaceful continent on the brink of war as the Asverellian Empire seeks to expand - at your homeland’s expense. Command unlikely heroes, fight challenging turn-based battles, and watch hardship forge iron into steel. Dark Deity is back, bigger and better than before!

name: QubiQuest: Castle Craft
summary: QubiQuest: Castle Craft is a game where players build huge castles in an ancient war-torn world and defend them against hordes of enemies in chaotic siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of voxel sandbox, action, and horde defence.

name: Folklands
summary: Folklands is a grid-based, relaxing settlement builder with simulated citizens. Grow your settlement from humble beginnings to a bustling town. Harvest resources, manage food supply and make sure your folks are happy, employed and safe.
